comments.body:
Could we also have tests
- for missing hint 
- for duplicate party names
- for presence and correctness of displayName

Improved the IT to:
- Allocate a party with and without a hint
- Allocate a party with and without a display name
- Check the correctness of displayName
- Concurrently allocate 100 new parties, checking whether they all get unique names
- Deal with implementations that return `UNIMPLEMENTED` or `INVALID_ARGUMENT`
